task.summary: Default task

добавлен запрос на Вибратор =В. код для подцвечивания выбранной даты теперь обернут в метод setSelectedBackground(View v, GridView gridview); добавлено вибрирование и звук при выборе даты (долгое нажатие) --надо протестить не сломается ли аппа при вибрирований на устройствах без "Вибратора"
исправлено - подцвечивать названия дней и пустых дней
green-red circle click listeners
Дни недели теперь начинаются с понедельника и заканчиваются воскресением
JSON parsing from urls, async tasks to retrieve the jsons
Dates parsed from db work yaaay
Removed debugging toasts, added fade_in animation
migration to the 3-dot indicator system, stop current date text recoloring
moved indicators to the right of date
Changed Day headers, adjusted selected dates paddings
My name for today is "the visual bug killer" (padding stuff)
Day details container and animation
Selecting a date item and first detailContainer animation issue solved (i think)
detail date now conditional, only showing on clicking a date with icons visible. Animation\interpolator FUN!
Removed some unneeded crap
More animation work
Before i fuck up the date backend
no dice, but correct equality test

Added an additional field to the date gridview item "bind", to keep track to which object in the arraylist is the date bound to. Distinguish years. Now uses event object to get events, event counts etc etc
Moved tryparse to utils class, a little code cleaning. Date details are now hidden if a date with no events is clicked. added exit to left animation
a few optimizations
pending and minepending
friendlist drawable icon and button, added DRAWERS! distinguish between right and left drawer open/close callbacks
inflate drawer, friend object, get selected items from listview

AnimationHelper class. Removed left drawer, right drawer now holds a linearlayout which can hold multiple listview or any other views - so now there is also an additional listview for groups (needs adapter, layout, and selection functionality)
Compare friendlists, update only on if they are different. recycling views bug
Fixed checked firendlists views not keeping their state(background color) however the solution hogs a lot of memory, needs to be tested on lower end devices
applied viewholder pattern to FriendListAdapter
Scrolling up/down on listview detection
CHecked/unchecked friends are now managed by getview and the boolean in the object arraylist as a result major improvement in memory allocation (~15mb vs ~70mb in a 100 friend list)
friendList is now composed of Friend objects that extend User and add the specific checkedInList boolean
show/hide groups/friends
Scroll tracker helper- tracks how much offset there is on scroll event of an AbsList. manipulate height of friends header while scrolling

Fixed jumpy friendlist scrolling, but introduced a bug where wrong items are selected on click - temporary solution: increment checkeds by 1 which seems to give correct positioning, but needs a better fix
overridden the getitem method in friends adapter. added orange m&m's as the avatar image. randomly assign avatars - testing purposes
Replaced standard (and boring) android progress bar with smoothprogress bar.
moved detail day view to bottom
class and view for detailed day view added
Event object now implements the parcelable interface - can be passed around activities

MESSAGE.value: Removed some unneeded crap
More animation work
Before i fuck up the date backend
no dice, but correct equality test

Added an additional field to the date gridview item "bind", to keep track to which object in the arraylist is the date bound to. Distinguish years. Now uses event object to get events, event counts etc etc
Moved tryparse to utils class, a little code cleaning. Date details are now hidden if a date with no events is clicked. added exit to left animation
a few optimizations
pending and minepending
friendlist drawable icon and button, added DRAWERS! distinguish between right and left drawer open/close callbacks
inflate drawer, friend object, get selected items from listview

AnimationHelper class. Removed left drawer, right drawer now holds a linearlayout which can hold multiple listview or any other views - so now there is also an additional listview for groups (needs adapter, layout, and selection functionality)
Compare friendlists, update only on if they are different. recycling views bug
Fixed checked firendlists views not keeping their state(background color) however the solution hogs a lot of memory, needs to be tested on lower end devices
applied viewholder pattern to FriendListAdapter
Scrolling up/down on listview detection
CHecked/unchecked friends are now managed by getview and the boolean in the object arraylist as a result major improvement in memory allocation (~15mb vs ~70mb in a 100 friend list)
friendList is now composed of Friend objects that extend User and add the specific checkedInList boolean
show/hide groups/friends
Scroll tracker helper- tracks how much offset there is on scroll event of an AbsList. manipulate height of friends header while scrolling

Fixed jumpy friendlist scrolling, but introduced a bug where wrong items are selected on click - temporary solution: increment checkeds by 1 which seems to give correct positioning, but needs a better fix
overridden the getitem method in friends adapter. added orange m&m's as the avatar image. randomly assign avatars - testing purposes
Replaced standard (and boring) android progress bar with smoothprogress bar.
moved detail day view to bottom
class and view for detailed day view added
Event object now implements the parcelable interface - can be passed around activities
